document_data.name: Smoke
document_data.mainbody: '''Smoke''' was one of the three [[ninja]] in the service of [[Daisake Mayazato]] in the town of [[Aru]] in [[Wa]].
document_data.History: Smoke trained in the ninja arts in the [[Warazama clan]] together with [[Moonlight]] and [[Snake (ninja)|Snake]], until that clan was destroyed by internal dissent. He and his fellows entered into the service of Daisake Mayazato to repay him for previous services.
